verses.arabic: حمٓ
verses.translation: Ha-Mim.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: By the Book that makes things clear;-

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةٍ مُّبَـٰرَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: We sent it down during a Blessed Night: for We (ever) wish to warn (against Evil).
verses.transliteration: Inna anzalnahu fee laylatin mubarakatininna kunna munthireen

verses.arabic: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
verses.translation: In the (Night) is made distinct every affair of wisdom,

verses.arabic: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
verses.translation: By command, from Our Presence. For We (ever) send (revelations),

verses.arabic: رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: As Mercy from thy Lord: for He hears and knows (all things);
verses.transliteration: Rahmatan min rabbika innahu huwa assameeAAualAAaleem

verses.arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all between them, if ye (but) have an assured faith.
verses.transliteration: Rabbi assamawati wal-ardiwama baynahuma in kuntum mooqineen

verses.arabic: لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: There is no god but He: It is He Who gives life and gives death,- The Lord and Cherisher to you and your earliest ancestors.
verses.transliteration: La ilaha illa huwa yuhyeewayumeetu rabbukum warabbu aba-ikumu al-awwaleen

verses.arabic: بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.translation: Yet they play about in doubt.

verses.arabic: فَٱرْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِى ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Then watch thou for the Day that the sky will bring forth a kind of smoke (or mist) plainly visible,

verses.arabic: يَغْشَى ٱلنَّاسَ ۖ هَـٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Enveloping the people: this will be a Penalty Grievous.

verses.arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: (They will say:) "Our Lord! remove the Penalty from us, for we do really believe!"

verses.arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: How shall the message be (effectual) for them, seeing that an Messenger explaining things clearly has (already) come to them,-
verses.transliteration: Anna lahumu aththikrawaqad jaahum rasoolun mubeen

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا۟ مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Yet they turn away from him and say: "Tutored (by others), a man possessed!"

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَآئِدُونَ
verses.translation: We shall indeed remove the Penalty for a while, (but) truly ye will revert (to your ways).

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ ٱلْبَطْشَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
verses.translation: One day We shall seize you with a mighty onslaught: We will indeed (then) exact Retribution!

verses.arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: We did, before them, try the people of Pharaoh: there came to them a messenger most honourable,
verses.transliteration: Walaqad fatanna qablahum qawmafirAAawna wajaahum rasoolun kareem

verses.arabic: أَنْ أَدُّوٓا۟ إِلَىَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Saying: "Restore to me the Servants of Allah: I am to you an messenger worthy of all trust;
verses.transliteration: An addoo ilayya AAibada Allahiinnee lakum rasoolun ameen

verses.arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: "And be not arrogant as against Allah: for I come to you with authority manifest.
verses.transliteration: Waan la taAAloo AAala Allahiinnee ateekum bisultanin mubeen

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ
verses.translation: "For me, I have sought safety with my Lord and your Lord, against your injuring me.

verses.arabic: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ لِى فَٱعْتَزِلُونِ
verses.translation: "If ye believe me not, at least keep yourselves away from me."

verses.arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: (But they were aggressive:) then he cried to his Lord: "These are indeed a people given to sin."

verses.arabic: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.translation: (The reply came:) "March forth with My Servants by night: for ye are sure to be pursued.

verses.arabic: وَٱتْرُكِ ٱلْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌ مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.translation: "And leave the sea as a furrow (divided): for they are a host (destined) to be drowned."

verses.arabic: كَمْ تَرَكُوا۟ مِن جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: How many were the gardens and springs they left behind,

verses.arabic: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: And corn-fields and noble buildings,

verses.arabic: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا۟ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And wealth (and conveniences of life), wherein they had taken such delight!

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Thus (was their end)! And We made other people inherit (those things)!

verses.arabic: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنظَرِينَ
verses.translation: And neither heaven nor earth shed a tear over them: nor were they given a respite (again).
verses.transliteration: Fama bakat AAalayhimu assamaowal-ardu wama kanoo munthareen

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ
verses.translation: We did deliver aforetime the Children of Israel from humiliating Punishment,
verses.transliteration: Walaqad najjayna banee isra-eelamina alAAathabi almuheen

verses.arabic: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: Inflicted by Pharaoh, for he was arrogant (even) among inordinate transgressors.
verses.transliteration: Min firAAawna innahu kana AAaliyanmina almusrifeen

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخْتَرْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And We chose them aforetime above the nations, knowingly,

verses.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَـٰٓؤٌا۟ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And granted them Signs in which there was a manifest trial
verses.transliteration: Waataynahum mina al-ayatima feehi balaon mubeen

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: As to these (Quraish), they say forsooth:

verses.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
verses.translation: "There is nothing beyond our first death, and we shall not be raised again.
verses.transliteration: In hiya illa mawtatuna al-oolawama nahnu bimunshareen

verses.arabic: فَأْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: "Then bring (back) our forefathers, if what ye say is true!"

verses.arabic: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: What! Are they better than the people of Tubba and those who were before them? We destroyed them because they were guilty of sin.
verses.transliteration: Ahum khayrun am qawmu tubbaAAin wallatheenamin qablihim ahlaknahum innahum kanoo mujrimeen

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَـٰعِبِينَ
verses.translation: We created not the heavens, the earth, and all between them, merely in (idle) sport:
verses.transliteration: Wama khalaqna assamawatiwal-arda wama baynahuma laAAibeen

verses.arabic: مَا خَلَقْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: We created them not except for just ends: but most of them do not understand.
verses.transliteration: Ma khalaqnahuma illabilhaqqi walakinna aktharahum layaAAlamoon

verses.arabic: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ مِيقَـٰتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: Verily the Day of sorting out is the time appointed for all of them,-

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًى شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: The Day when no protector can avail his client in aught, and no help can they receive,
verses.transliteration: Yawma la yughnee mawlan AAan mawlanshay-an wala hum yunsaroon

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Except such as receive Allah's Mercy: for He is Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
verses.transliteration: Illa man rahima Allahuinnahu huwa alAAazeezu arraheem

verses.arabic: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
verses.translation: Verily the tree of Zaqqum

verses.arabic: طَعَامُ ٱلْأَثِيمِ
verses.translation: Will be the food of the Sinful,-

verses.arabic: كَٱلْمُهْلِ يَغْلِى فِى ٱلْبُطُونِ
verses.translation: Like molten brass; it will boil in their insides.

verses.arabic: كَغَلْىِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: Like the boiling of scalding water.

verses.arabic: خُذُوهُ فَٱعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: (A voice will cry: "Seize ye him and drag him into the midst of the Blazing Fire!

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا۟ فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِۦ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: "Then pour over his head the Penalty of Boiling Water,
verses.transliteration: Thumma subboo fawqa ra/sihi min AAathabialhameem

verses.arabic: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْكَرِيمُ
verses.translation: "Taste thou (this)! Truly wast thou mighty, full of honour!

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمْتَرُونَ
verses.translation: "Truly this is what ye used to doubt!"

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: As to the Righteous (they will be) in a position of Security,

verses.arabic: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Among Gardens and Springs;

verses.arabic: يَلْبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
verses.translation: Dressed in fine silk and in rich brocade, they will face each other;

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.translation: So; and We shall join them to fair women with beautiful, big, and lustrous eyes.

verses.arabic: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
verses.translation: There can they call for every kind of fruit in peace and security;

verses.arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ إِلَّا ٱلْمَوْتَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Nor will they there taste Death, except the first death; and He will preserve them from the Penalty of the Blazing Fire,-
verses.transliteration: La yathooqoona feehaalmawta illa almawtata al-oola wawaqahum AAathabaaljaheem

verses.arabic: فَضْلًا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: As a Bounty from thy Lord! that will be the supreme achievement!
verses.transliteration: Fadlan min rabbika thalikahuwa alfawzu alAAatheem

verses.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Verily, We have made this (Qur'an) easy, in thy tongue, in order that they may give heed.

verses.arabic: فَٱرْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُم مُّرْتَقِبُونَ
verses.translation: So wait thou and watch; for they (too) are waiting.
